channel.title: How to make the IPBAN Work
channel.description: Hi guy's.. another question please. How do I make it so.. When I Ipban someone they cant just change there Ip and log back in.. Also how do I stop VPNs coming in? i've seen a few servers where you cant get in at all if you try everything

item.title: How to make the IPBAN Work
item.dc:creator: @Andy1993 Andy1993
item.description:
@Andy1993 wrote:

Hi guy’s… another question please.
How do I make it so… When I Ipban someone they cant just change there Ip and log back in…
Also how do I stop VPNs coming in? i’ve seen a few servers where you cant get in at all if you try everything

Read full topic
